name: WittyBitz-Rebuilt
description:
CONTROLS

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MOVEMENT-> WASD and Run -> Shift WASD        OR       UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT

Z= INVENTORY

C= Character/Lvl Up

F = Cast Magic

O = SPELL LIST {only above lvl 2}

SPACE = ATTACK

E = TALK/INTERACT

ESC = Menu

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                        WORLD MAP CONTROLS

TAB to swap between World Map and Local Map

UpDownLeftRight to Move

Q and E for debug fFarView

W and S for Z direction

SPACE to "jump"

Z and X for debug fFarNearView

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                       Spells

LVL  2 = You get FireBall -- Cooldown 2 sec

LVL 5 = FireStream -- cd 12 sec

LVL 10 = FireBomb -- cd 12 sec

LVL 15 = Blink  -- cd 12 sec {can screw your self over so be carefull :)}

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                            :Description:

Javidx9 made this about 4 years ago but was unable to include all the features he wanted because of time contrasts.  This reconstructed the scrappy files in the Console Game Engine then rebuild them in the Pixel Game Engine. After this the sound engine, spell class,  title screen, options menu,  extra maps, world map etc .

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                            Dev Cheats

H = + 1 lvl

Y = full hp, mana, and +100 gold
